name: End of Machina Factory
description:
End of Machina Factory

The power supply of the Machina Factory has been cut. As the chief robot of the factory you have to use every bit of remaining power to produce as many items as possible. Otherwise, a cruel end awaits you and your fellow worker robots.

Controls:
Left-Click to progress in dialogue

Left-Click a robot to interact with it

Left-Click a button in the popup window to perform actions
